definition: The Sing-Song Girls of Shanghai by Han Bangqing 韓邦慶|韩邦庆[Han2 Bang1 qing4], long novel of lower life in Classical Chinese and Jiangsu vernacular/translated into Putonghua as 海上花 by Iris Chang
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
